description:
A first-year student at Arisugawa Academy. As her parents had a poor relationship since she was a child, she felt distanced from the other students around her who had peaceful childhoods. In junior high school, she heard a song by Kokoa which resonated with her. Inspired to write her first poem then, her talent for writing lyrics has blossomed. Although she seems to do things at her own pace, she is deeply observant and sometimes says things that strike at the heart of the matter
She is in a relationship with Kokoa
name: Tendo Hayate
